welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Mandelieu-la-Napoule! Known for its stunning beaches and picturesque landscapes, we invite you to explore and savor the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mandelieu Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cote D'azur International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Cote D'azur International Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Cote D'azur International Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
